# AirFreshiesByColleen E-commerce Website

This project is an e-commerce website for selling custom air fresheners with Square payment integration.

## Project Requirements
- Landing page with welcome message
- Product customization flow: Mold → Color (with light/dark/plain variants) → Scent → Glitter option → Bead option
- Shopping cart functionality
- Square payment integration
- Modern responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 structure
- Implement responsive CSS design
- Use vanilla JavaScript for interactivity
- Follow Square Web Payments SDK integration patterns
- Maintain clean, readable code structure
